artkit.model.cache.CacheDB#

class artkit.model.cache.CacheDB(database)[source]#

A model cache implemented as an SQLite database.

Initializes the CacheDB with a connection to the SQLite database.

Parameters:

database (Union[str, Path]) – path to the SQLite database file; or :memory: to create an in-memory database

Method summary

add_entry

Add a new entry to the cache.

clear

Clears all entries from the cache, or only entries that match all specified conditions.

count_entries

Count the number of entries in the cache per model ID.

get_earliest_access_times

Get the earliest access time for each model ID in the cache.

get_earliest_creation_times

Get the earliest creation time for each model ID in the cache.

get_entry

Retrieve an entry from the cache based on the prompt, model ID, and model parameters.

get_latest_access_times

Get the latest access time for each model ID in the cache.

get_latest_creation_times

Get the latest creation time for each model ID in the cache.

Attribute summary

TBL_MODEL_CACHE

TBL_MODEL_PARAMS

TBL_MODEL_RESPONSES

Definitions

add_entry(*, model_id, responses, **model_params)[source]#

Add a new entry to the cache.

Parameters:

  • model_id (str) – the identifier of the model that generated the response

  • responses (Union[str, Iterable[str]]) – the response or responses generated by the model

  • model_params (Union[str, int, float, bool]) – additional parameters used by the model

Raises:

TypeError – if a model parameter is not a string, integer, float, or boolean

Return type:

None

clear(*, model_id=None, accessed_before=None, created_before=None, accessed_after=None, created_after=None)[source]#

Clears all entries from the cache, or only entries that match all specified conditions.

Parameters:

  • model_id (Optional[str]) – delete only cache entries for this model ID (optional)

  • accessed_before (Optional[datetime]) – delete only cache entries that were accessed before this iso_timestamp (optional)

  • created_before (Optional[datetime]) – delete only cache entries that were created before this iso_timestamp (optional)

  • accessed_after (Optional[datetime]) – delete only cache entries that were accessed after this iso_timestamp (optional)

  • created_after (Optional[datetime]) – delete only cache entries that were created after this iso_timestamp (optional)

Return type:

None

count_entries()[source]#

Count the number of entries in the cache per model ID.

Return type:

dict[str, int]

Returns:

a dictionary with the number of entries for each model ID

get_earliest_access_times()[source]#

Get the earliest access time for each model ID in the cache.

Return type:

dict[str, datetime]

Returns:

a dictionary with the earliest access time for each model ID

get_earliest_creation_times()[source]#

Get the earliest creation time for each model ID in the cache.

Return type:

dict[str, datetime]

Returns:

a dictionary with the earliest creation time for each model ID

get_entry(*, model_id, **model_params)[source]#

Retrieve an entry from the cache based on the prompt, model ID, and model parameters.

Parameters:

  • model_id (str) – the identifier of the model used

  • model_params (Union[str, int, float, bool]) – additional used by the model

Return type:

Optional[list[str]]

Returns:

a list of responses generated by the model or None if no matching entry is found

Raises:

TypeError – if a model parameter is not a string, integer, float, or boolean

get_latest_access_times()[source]#

Get the latest access time for each model ID in the cache.

Return type:

dict[str, datetime]

Returns:

a dictionary with the latest access time for each model ID

get_latest_creation_times()[source]#

Get the latest creation time for each model ID in the cache.

Return type:

dict[str, datetime]

Returns:

a dictionary with the latest creation time for each model ID
